description:
We are Reading Specialists/Interventionists knowledgeable in research based strategies proven to target and reduce symptoms of dyslexia. We provide effective, individualized and specialized instruction designed to meet the specific reading needs of each child. Our students go up 1 grade level in reading in 10-16 sessions.

Services: Early Reading Intervention, Reading Improvement/Acceleration, Evaluation/Assessment, Dyslexia/Dyscalculia, ADD/ADHD
name: READING AND DYSLEXIA CENTER OF FLORIDA, LLC.
